dmca.title: A Silver Bullet aimed at alleged copyist
dmca.body:
Good morning [Private], I just came across your website, and was interested in a couple of things that I believe refer to my website.

Your web page
http://hurog.com/silverbullets.shtml
Directly defames my website without even the common courtesy of providing a link. One clear quote is

"I did find one company making silver bullets, but they were out of
stock, and the web site didn't look well maintained"

Throughout the rest of your site you clearly reference other sites with links regardless of their
